pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python wrapper for MailGun REST APIDocumentation:=============Please visit our documentation page athttp://documentation.mailgun.netInstallation============There are two ways to install Mailgun API:1. sudo python setup.py install2. Grab mailgun.py from the 'lib' folder of this repo and place it on your PYTHONPATH manuallySamples tryout:===================> ./run_sample.sh samples/creating-routes.py> ./run_sample.sh samples/sending-mail.py> ./run_sample.sh samples/using-mailboxes.pyGetting started:================from mailgun import Mailgun, MailboxMailgun.init("my-api-key", "https://mailgun.net/api")for mailbox in Mailbox.find(): print "{0} has size of {1}".format (mailbox.id, mailbox.size)For more visit http://documentation.mailgun.net--MG team
